pytorch_privacy.optimizer.dp_optimizer module¶

class pytorch_privacy.optimizer.dp_optimizer.DPGaussianOptimizer(l2_norm_clip, noise_multiplier, ledger=None, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: pytorch_privacy.optimizer.dp_optimizer.DPOptimizer

Specific Gaussian mechanism optimizer for L2 clipping and noise privacy

property ledger¶
class pytorch_privacy.optimizer.dp_optimizer.DPOptimizer(optimizer, model, loss_per_example, dp_sum_query, num_microbatches=None)[source]¶

Bases: pytorch_privacy.optimizer.wrapper_optimizer.WrapperOptimizer

Optimiser wrapper for doing differential privacy on any gradient based PyTorch optimiser.

apply_grads(param_groups, grads)[source]¶
fit_batch(x: torch.Tensor, y: torch.Tensor)[source]¶

Perform a single gradient optimisation step of the model with differentially private gradients :param x: The model inputs :param y: The model outputs :return: The total loss of (x, y) at this step

get_grads(param_groups)[source]¶
get_logged_statistics()[source]¶

Return any relevant statistics about the optimisation process that might be of interest for inspection. E.g. this could be statistics about the gradients, or the clipping of gradients for DP optimisers. :return: A nested dictionary structure of logged statistics

get_step_summary()[source]¶

Return a simple summary of the step if this is desired. Designed to be able to report on the fly metrics for monitoring purposes :return: A nested dictionary of summary information
